name: CATastrophic (CloudIsG)
description:
Images from Game:

\

Description:

This was made for the final project of one of my classes through the Bitsy game engine!

This game is about my experience trying to get my cats (Flash and Bell) to get along. Through the story you will find journals from me that explain the story that is unfolding, and why it had to turn into the solution that was made!

The game takes place in my home so everything is modeled from what the interior of my house so it is like allowing for the most complete experience of what I really went through!

Controls: 

Use the arrow keys to move around up, down, left and right 

or W, A, S, and D

Personal Comments: 

Please enjoy and feel free to leave feedback I would love to hear it.

Reading the journals is important to understand the most of what is going on in the story so don't skip past them!
